Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed with exceptional quality and functionality in mind. It's not just a product; it's an experience tailored to enhance your daily life. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I'm offering this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $120. This is an excellent chance to upgrade your lifestyle with a product that truly stands out. Don't miss out on this limited-time offer! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
